Posts.EditableText: 'Suppose only Elex knows this at the moment, but I found time to tell everyone. I am currently moving house, and this is the last 30 minutes I will have access to the internet for around 2-3 weeks max. Not looking forward to the 4 hour drive south in a hot truck with two cats and a school of goldfish crawling through my hair. Will miss you all, and love ya with an equal amount. Good luck with all of your game projects! Don't worry, because [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/I'll_be_back:zo0ixipj]I'll be back[/url:zo0ixipj]! And remember, [img:zo0ixipj]http://bighugelabs.com/flickr/output/motivator4559776.jpg[/img:zo0ixipj]
